title: My adc games in a nutshell
body: (solo queue) Can we all agree that Mundo is not meant to be played as a support in silver ranked games. Can this just not happen. Can we also agree that flaming your adc for losing lane when she is trying her hardest to cs with a Mundo feeding 0/2/0 in the first 5 minutes of the game. Can we also not blame the adc when her gank has no wards and has had no ganks since the start of the game when she leashed the jungler. Can we agree?
